column4: Anybody know anything about NetworkManager overwriting resolv.conf?  It's happening to me on every reboot :(
I'd rather fix the problem.  Going to trying uninstalling network-manager altogether
System->Preferences->Network Connections, edit your connection, on the ipv4 settings change it from DHCP to DHCP (addresses only)
That will stop it from using dhcp dns info to overwrite resolv.conf
